name: Commodore 16 Atic Atac V1.8
description:
This is the conversion of Atic Atac for the Commodore 16 (264 series) computer.

It runs in 16K and requires joystick in port 1.

Now includes indication of you current floor.

To shoot press the fire button and a direction.
To pick up or drop items you must be stationary and hold the fire button down.
The game ends when all your 4 lives are lost or you collect the 3 FSD keys and return to the starting room with the keys in the inventory in the correct order (to form a key).

Each character has access to different doors throughout the game. If a door is grey your character cannot go through it.

Apples can be collected to boost your health.

Coloured keys open the respective coloured doors, whilst in the inventory.

Ghoulies that appear can be defeated by shooting them. Don't let them touch you as they drain your life force.

Bosses can be defeated by collecting the appropriate item scattered through the mansion. Bosses cannot be shot.

Special thanks go to Csabo, Luca, Gerliczer, Mad, Chronos, Kichy and others for their support both technical and emotional.
